backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining data types for games, quizzes, puzzles, sounds, and templates, with localization utilities and in-memory maps for storing all content.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and contexts.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens for the UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring early Android audio bridge detection and registering the service worker.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, offline navigation fallback, and stale‑while‑revalidate asset caching.
frontend/README.md: Frontend overview documenting features, offline support, and the Android audio bridge system.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component controlling page navigation, age selection, providers, and background music handling.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusicS: Modal allowing users to choose background music via radio options and update selection in context.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationModal: Celebration popup with confetti, sound, and localized messages shown after completing a level or quiz.
frontend/src/components/coloring/Colorin: Interactive coloring canvas supporting drawing, undo, zoom, pinch gestures, and template loading.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple animated footer displaying colorful star and sparkle icons.
frontend/src/components/games/LogicPuzzl: Logic puzzle game that generates age-based puzzles, tracks progress, and handles user answers.
frontend/src/components/games/MathPuzzle: Generates age‑adaptive math problems with multiple choice answers and tracks score and progress across a fixed number of questions.
frontend/src/components/games/MemoryCard: Implements a memory matching game using various emoji themes, handling flipping, matching logic, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/components/games/ProblemSol: Presents age‑appropriate situational problems with multiple options, selects randomized scenarios, and tracks solved count and scoring.
frontend/src/components/games/QuickReact: Runs a timed reaction game where players tap a correct emoji target among distractors, adjusting difficulty by age group.
frontend/src/components/games/ShapeMatch: Generates shape pairs based on matching rules and level config, handling selection, matching, and progression.
frontend/src/components/games/SortingCla: Implements a sorting game where users assign items to categories, tracking selections, validation, remaining items and completion flow.
frontend/src/components/games/VisualReco: Provides a visual recognition game that generates random difference points on themed scenes and checks user clicks until all differences are found.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with app title, language selector, audio controls, music selector, and a home button.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown menu for choosing the app’s language with flags and names.
frontend/src/config/audioConfig.ts: Defines Android-only audio mode detection using runtime flags or environment variables and exposes a helper to check the mode.
frontend/src/contexts/AudioSettingsConte: Context for persisting and toggling background music and sound effects mute settings, synced with the audio service.
frontend/src/contexts/BackgroundMusicCon: Context managing the selected background music track with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides app-wide language state with validation, persistence, and mapping to backend language enums.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppBackgroundMusic: Manages background audio playback across navigation with Android bridge detection, autoplay gating, and track switching logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundAudio.ts: Starts background audio only after user interaction and prevents duplicate restarts, with cleanup on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks to fetch games, quiz questions, encouragement messages, and other content from the backend, mapping frontend age groups to backend formats.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomizedQuizQues: React Query hook fetching randomized quiz questions from the backend based on age group, language, and count.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a colorful theme, base styling, font, and custom animations.
Exports a list of selectable background music options with IDs and labels.
frontend/src/lib/coloringFallbackTemplat: Provides structured fallback coloring templates per age group with strict outline-only image rules.
frontend/src/lib/dailySurprise.ts: Generates or retrieves a deterministic daily surprise game per age group, storing results in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/fallbackQuizQuestions.t: Contains extensive fallback quiz questions in Turkish and English organized by age group.
frontend/src/lib/quizQuestionSelection.t: Utilities for randomized quiz question selection with history-based repeat reduction and localStorage tracking.
frontend/src/lib/shapeMatchingRoundConfi: Generates shape‑matching round settings based on age group and level, defining pair counts and rule/shape options.
frontend/src/lib/shapeMatchingRules.ts: Defines shape‑matching rule types, evaluation logic, and utilities for retrieving rules allowed per age group.
frontend/src/lib/sortingClassificationIt: Provides category lists and expanded item pools per age group for the sorting/classification game.
frontend/src/lib/sortingClassificationSe: Selects session items for sorting/classification with repetition avoidance, validation, and localStorage history.
frontend/src/lib/sounds.ts: Declares sound ID lists and functions to validate SFX and background sound identifiers.
frontend/src/lib/translations.ts: Contains shared translation strings and language codes for the app's UI text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringZone.tsx: Displays a list of coloring templates from backend or fallback and loads a coloring canvas when a template is selected.
frontend/src/pages/GameZone.tsx: Fetches available games, manages game selection and completion flow, and renders the chosen game with celebration handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the welcome screen, handles age-group selection, and navigates to games, quiz, or coloring sections.
frontend/src/pages/QuizZone.tsx: Loads quiz questions from backend or fallback, runs the quiz flow with scoring and progress tracking, and shows a celebration on completion.
frontend/src/services/audio.ts: Provides Android-specific and web fallback audio playback for sound effects and background music with mute controls and validation.
frontend/src/types/androidBridge.d.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for Android WebView audio bridges handling background music and sound effects independently.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known audio mute issues, existing feature entries, and a pending new feature request.
